description: Welcome to THE GROVE, a collection of 49 contemporary townhomes coming to the ever-expanding Burquitlam neighbourhood. Inspired by the tradition of single-family living, homes are custom designed to feature open-concept interiors that look out onto lush outdoor courtyards. This corner, GLE plan home includes direct access to secured underground parking plus a convenient storage/flex space. The main floor overlooks a private front and back yard and on the second level you'll find 2 spacious bedrooms plus a den and conveniently allocated laundry. Enjoy the sunrise and the sunset from the primary suite and the private balcony, which span the entire upper level. Move in Summer 2026! Our Presentation Centre is now open Saturday and Sunday 12-4pm at Unit 200 - 3355 North Road, Burnaby.
